title: Gayatri Mantra
description: Sacred Gayatri Mantra for spiritual enlightenment and divine wisdom
content:
ॐ भूर्भुवः स्वः
तत्सवितुर्वरेण्यं
भर्गो देवस्य धीमहि
धियो यो नः प्रचोदयात्
author: Vedic

metadata.transliteration: Om Bhur Bhuvaḥ Swaḥ, Tat-savitur Vareṇyaṃ, Bhargo Devasya Dhīmahi, Dhiyo Yonaḥ Prachodayāt
metadata.meaning: We meditate on the glory of the Creator who has created the universe, who is worthy of worship, who is the embodiment of knowledge and light, who is the remover of all sin and ignorance. May He enlighten our intellect.
